Rules.InvariantScript:
//these are the SVGs. I'm using a Switch() function as otherwise we would not be able to dynamically change the icon colour when the menu item is active. If you are not comfortable using SVG's, I would suggest toggling the IconsSVGorStandard to Off and using standard out-of-the-box icons.
"data:image/svg+xml;
    utf8,
        "&EncodeUrl("   
            "&Switch(
                ThisItem.MenuItem,

                //name of gallery item //

                "Start",
                //svg code
                "<svg 
                    version='1.1'
                    id='Capa_1'
                    xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' 
                    xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' 
                    x='0px' 
                    y='0px'
	                width='39.434px'
                    height='39.434px'
                    viewBox='0 0 39.434 39.434'
                    style='enable-background:new 0 0 39.434 39.434;'
	                xml:space='preserve'
                > 
                    <defs>  
                        <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>  
                            <stop offset='15%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient1&" ;'></stop>  
                            <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient2&" ;'></stop>  
                        </linearGradient>
                    </defs> 
                    <g>
	                <path
                        fill='
                            "&If(
                                ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                "url(#gradient)",
                                "#BDBDBD"
                            )&"'
                        d='M39.434,20.718c0,1.104-0.895,2-2,2c-0.004,0-0.012,0-0.02,0h-3.805v10.637c0,1.104-0.896,2-2,2h-6.568
		c-1.104,0-2-0.896-2-2v-5.638c0-1.838-1.496-3.333-3.333-3.333c-1.838,0-3.334,1.495-3.334,3.333v5.638c0,1.104-0.896,2-2,2H7.805
		c-1.104,0-2-0.896-2-2V22.718H2c-0.844,0-1.598-0.528-1.882-1.322c-0.285-0.795-0.043-1.682,0.606-2.22L18.432,4.538
		c0.74-0.611,1.81-0.611,2.549,0L38.526,19.04C39.072,19.398,39.434,20.016,39.434,20.718z'
                    /> 

                 //snippet responsible for animation 
                    "&If(
                        'Mobile Navigation Menu'.Animation= true ,
                        "<animateTransform 
                            attributeName='transform'
                            type='translate'
                            values='
                                "&If(
                                    ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                    "0 0;0 4;0 0",
                                    "0 0;0 0;0 0"
                                )&"'
                            dur='1s'
                            repeatCount='indefinite'
                        />",
                        ""
                    )&"
                    </g>",
                "Home",
                //svg code
                "<svg 
                    version='1.1'
                    id='Capa_1'
                    xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' 
                    xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' 
                    x='0px' 
                    y='0px'
	                width='39.434px'
                    height='39.434px'
                    viewBox='0 0 39.434 39.434'
                    style='enable-background:new 0 0 39.434 39.434;'
	                xml:space='preserve'
                > 
                    <defs>  
                        <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>  
                            <stop offset='15%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient1&" ;'></stop>  
                            <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient2&" ;'></stop>  
                        </linearGradient>
                    </defs> 
                    <g>
	                <path
                        fill='
                            "&If(
                                ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                "url(#gradient)",
                                "#BDBDBD"
                            )&"'
                        d='M39.434,20.718c0,1.104-0.895,2-2,2c-0.004,0-0.012,0-0.02,0h-3.805v10.637c0,1.104-0.896,2-2,2h-6.568
		c-1.104,0-2-0.896-2-2v-5.638c0-1.838-1.496-3.333-3.333-3.333c-1.838,0-3.334,1.495-3.334,3.333v5.638c0,1.104-0.896,2-2,2H7.805
		c-1.104,0-2-0.896-2-2V22.718H2c-0.844,0-1.598-0.528-1.882-1.322c-0.285-0.795-0.043-1.682,0.606-2.22L18.432,4.538
		c0.74-0.611,1.81-0.611,2.549,0L38.526,19.04C39.072,19.398,39.434,20.016,39.434,20.718z'
                    /> 

                 //snippet responsible for animation 
                    "&If(
                        'Mobile Navigation Menu'.Animation= true ,
                        "<animateTransform 
                            attributeName='transform'
                            type='translate'
                            values='
                                "&If(
                                    ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                    "0 0;0 4;0 0",
                                    "0 0;0 0;0 0"
                                )&"'
                            dur='1s'
                            repeatCount='indefinite'
                        />",
                        ""
                    )&"
                    </g>",
                    


                "Add new",
                "<svg
                    width='24px'
                    height='24px'
                    viewBox='0 0 26 26' 
                    xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
                >
                    <defs>  
                        <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>  
                            <stop offset='15%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient1&" ;'></stop>  
                            <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient2&" ;'></stop>  
                        </linearGradient>  
                    </defs> 
                    <path
                        fill='
                            "&If(
                                ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                "url(#gradient)",
                                "#BDBDBD"
                            )&"'
                        d='M3 6C3 4.34315 4.34315 3 6 3H18C19.6569 3 21 4.34315 21 6V12.0218C20.3945 11.6341 19.7204 11.3441 19 11.1739V6C19 5.44772 18.5523 5 18 5H6C5.44772 5 5 5.44772 5 6V18C5 18.5523 5.44772 19 6 19H11.1739C11.3441 19.7204 11.6341 20.3945 12.0218 21H6C4.34315 21 3 19.6569 3 18V6Z'                     />
                    <path
                        fill='
                            "&If(
                                ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                "url(#gradient)",
                                "rgb(225,225,225)"
                            )&"'
                        d='M23 17.5C23 14.4624 20.5376 12 17.5 12C14.4624 12 12 14.4624 12 17.5C12 20.5376 14.4624 23 17.5 23C20.5376 23 23 20.5376 23 17.5ZM18.0006 18L18.0011 20.5035C18.0011 20.7797 17.7773 21.0035 17.5011 21.0035C17.225 21.0035 17.0011 20.7797 17.0011 20.5035L17.0006 18H14.4961C14.22 18 13.9961 17.7762 13.9961 17.5C13.9961 17.2239 14.22 17 14.4961 17H17.0005L17 14.4993C17 14.2231 17.2239 13.9993 17.5 13.9993C17.7761 13.9993 18 14.2231 18 14.4993L18.0005 17H20.503C20.7792 17 21.003 17.2239 21.003 17.5C21.003 17.7762 20.7792 18 20.503 18H18.0006Z' 
                    />

                        //snippet responsible for animation 
                    "&If(
                        'Mobile Navigation Menu'.Animation= true ,
                        "<animateTransform
                            attributeName='transform'
                            type='translate'
                            values='
                                "&If(
                                    ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                    "0 0;0 4;0 0",
                                    "0 0;0 0;0 0"
                                )&"'
                            dur='1s'
                            repeatCount='indefinite'
                        />",
                        ""
                    )&"
                ",
                


                "Profile",
                "<!-- Uploaded to SVGRepo https://www.svgrepo.com -->
                <svg
                    version='1.2'
                    baseProfile='tiny'
                    id='Layer_1'
                    xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
                    xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'
	                x='0px'
                    y='0px'
                    viewBox='0 0 250 290' 
                    xml:space='preserve' 
                >
                    <defs>  
                        <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>  
                            <stop offset='15%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient1&" ;'></stop>  
                            <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient2&" ;'></stop>  
                        </linearGradient>  
                    </defs> 

                    <path
                        fill='
                            "&If(
                                ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                "url(#gradient)",
                                "#BDBDBD"
                            )&"' 
                        id='Layer_1_1_'
                        d='M128.3,48.5c30.4,0,54.3,24.1,54.3,54.3s-24.1,54.3-54.3,54.3S74,133.2,74,103S99.1,48.5,128.3,48.5z
	 M246,248.9v-21.3c0-34.8-25.8-54.3-59.6-54.3H69.6c-34.8,0-59.6,19.5-59.6,54.3v21.3H246z'
                    />
                    //snippet responsible for animation 
                    "&If(
                        'Mobile Navigation Menu'.Animation= true ,
                        "<animateTransform
                            attributeName='transform'
                            type='translate'
                            values='
                                "&If(
                                    ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                    "0 0;0 4;0 0",
                                    "0 0;0 0;0 0"
                                )&"'
                            dur='1s'
                            repeatCount='indefinite'
                        />",
                        ""
                    )&"
                ",
                
                "hanahana7",
                "<!-- Uploaded to SVGRepo https://www.svgrepo.com -->
                <svg
                    version='1.2'
                    baseProfile='tiny'
                    id='Layer_1'
                    xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
                    xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'
	                x='0px'
                    y='0px'
                    viewBox='0 0 93 43' 
                    xml:space='preserve' 
                >
                    <defs>  
                        <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>  
                            <stop offset='15%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient1&" ;'></stop>  
                            <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient2&" ;'></stop>  
                        </linearGradient>  
                    </defs> 
                    <g transform='translate(0.000000,43.000000) scale(0.100000,-0.100000)'
fill='#000000' stroke='none'>
                    <path
                        fill='
                            "&If(
                                ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                "url(#gradient)",
                                "#BDBDBD"
                            )&"' 
                        id='Layer_1_1_'
                        d='M25 384 c-19 -20 -22 -213 -3 -232 8 -8 46 -12 105 -12 l94 0 20 34 c20 34 49 46 108 46 26 0 26 0 -9 -27 -19 -15 -54 -46 -78 -71 -35 -36 -43 -49 -40 -75 l3 -32 228 -3 228 -2 18 44 c24 56 72 92 142 107 30 7 60 17 67 22 19 14 17 191 -3 207 -11 9 -44 11 -122 6 -60 -4 -119 -6 -133 -6 -14 0 -157 2 -318 4 -250 4 -294 2 -307 -10z m860 -93 l0 -84 -62 -17 c-77 -21 -123 -55 -148 -109 l-18 -41 -214 0 c-182 0 -213 2 -213 15 0 25 69 93 149 146 42 28 78 53 81 56 5 5 -63 0 -173 -13 -42 -5 -52 -11 -69 -40 l-20 -35 -82 3 -81 3 -3 89 c-2 49 -1 95 2 102 4 10 96 12 428 11 l423 -2 0 -84z'
                    />
                    </g>
                    //snippet responsible for animation 
                    "&If(
                        'Mobile Navigation Menu'.Animation= true ,
                        "<animateTransform
                            attributeName='transform'
                            type='translate'
                            values='
                                "&If(
                                    ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                    "0 0;0 4;0 0",
                                    "0 0;0 0;0 0"
                                )&"'
                            dur='1s'
                            repeatCount='indefinite'
                        />",
                        ""
                    )&"
                ",
                
                "Settings",
                "<svg
                    version='1.1'
                    id='Layer_1'
                    xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'
                    xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink'
                    x='0px'
                    y='0px'
	                viewBox='0 0 470 520'
                    style='enable-background:new 0 0 458.317 458.317;'
                    xml:space='preserve'
                >
                    <defs>  
                        <linearGradient id='gradient' x1='0%' y1='0%' x2='0%' y2='100%'>  
                            <stop offset='15%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient1&" ;'></stop>  
                            <stop offset='100%' style='stop-color: "&'Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconLinealGradient2&" ;'></stop>  
                        </linearGradient>  
                    </defs> 
                    <g>
	                    <g>
		                    <path
                                fill='
                                    "&If(
                                        ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                        "url(#gradient)",
                                        "#BDBDBDrgb(225,225,225)"
                                    )&"'
                                d='M446.185,179.159h-64.768c-2.536-7.702-5.636-15.15-9.26-22.29l45.818-45.818c4.737-4.737,4.737-12.416,0-17.152
			L364.416,40.34c-4.737-4.737-12.416-4.737-17.152,0l-45.818,45.818c-7.14-3.624-14.587-6.724-22.289-9.26V12.131
			c0.001-6.699-5.429-12.129-12.128-12.129h-75.743c-6.698,0-12.129,5.43-12.129,12.128v64.768
			c-7.702,2.535-15.149,5.636-22.29,9.26L111.05,40.341c-4.737-4.737-12.416-4.737-17.152,0L40.339,93.9
			c-4.737,4.736-4.737,12.416,0,17.152l45.817,45.817c-3.624,7.14-6.725,14.588-9.26,22.29H12.129C5.43,179.159,0,184.59,0,191.288
			v75.743c0,6.698,5.43,12.128,12.129,12.128h64.768c2.536,7.702,5.636,15.149,9.26,22.29L40.34,347.266
			c-4.737,4.736-4.737,12.416,0,17.152l53.559,53.559c4.737,4.736,12.416,4.736,17.152,0l45.817-45.817
			c7.14,3.624,14.587,6.725,22.29,9.26v64.768c0,6.698,5.43,12.128,12.129,12.128h75.743c6.698,0,12.129-5.43,12.129-12.128v-64.768
			c7.702-2.535,15.149-5.636,22.289-9.26l45.818,45.817c4.737,4.736,12.416,4.736,17.152,0l53.559-53.559
			c4.737-4.737,4.737-12.416,0-17.152l-45.817-45.817c3.624-7.14,6.724-14.587,9.26-22.289h64.768
			c6.698,0,12.129-5.43,12.129-12.128v-75.743C458.314,184.59,452.884,179.159,446.185,179.159z M229.157,289.542
			c-33.349,0-60.384-27.035-60.384-60.384s27.035-60.384,60.384-60.384s60.384,27.035,60.384,60.384
			S262.506,289.542,229.157,289.542z'
                            /> 
	                    </g>
                    </g>
                    //snippet responsible for animation 
                    "&If(
                        'Mobile Navigation Menu'.Animation= true ,
                        "<animateTransform
                            attributeName='transform'
                            type='translate'
                            values='
                                "&If(
                                    ThisItem.MenuScreenNavigate=App.ActiveScreen,
                                    "0 0;0 4;0 0",
                                    "0 0;0 0;0 0"
                                )&"'
                            dur='1s'
                            repeatCount='indefinite'
                        />",
                        ""
                    )&"
            ")&"  
                </svg>"
        )
If('Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconsSVGorStandard = true, true, false)
If('Mobile Navigation Menu'.IconsSVGorStandard = true, false, true)

CustomProperties.Name: MenuItems
CustomProperties.Tooltip: メニュー内のアイコン、その他をテーブル型で指定してください。指定可能な名前：[Start,Home,Add new,Profile,Settings]

CustomProperties.DisplayName: アニメーション有効化 -Animation-
CustomProperties.Name: Animation
CustomProperties.Tooltip: アニメーションを有効化します

CustomProperties.DisplayName: カスタムSVGまたは標準アイコン -IconsSVGorStandard-
CustomProperties.Name: IconsSVGorStandard
CustomProperties.Tooltip: オン→MNM_MenuLogoプロパティでコーディングされているSVG　オフ→PowerApps標準アイコン

CustomProperties.Name: StandardIconColour
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 標準のアイコンの色を指定します ※カスタムSVGでは使用されません

CustomProperties.Name: IconLinealGradient1
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 1番目のグラデーションを指定します(HEX値)

CustomProperties.Name: IconLinealGradient2
CustomProperties.Tooltip: 2番目のグラデーションを指定します(HEX値)

CustomProperties.Name: DarkMode
CustomProperties.Tooltip: ダークモードを有効にします
